t = int(input())
result = []
for _ in range(t):
    x = int(input())
    m = x
    tax = 0
    if m > 1500000:
        y = m - 1500000
        tax += 0.3 * y
        m -= y
    if m > 1250000:
        y = m - 1250000
        tax += 0.25 * y
        m -= y
    if m > 1000000:
        y = m - 1000000
        tax += 0.2 * y
        m -= y
    if m > 750000:
        y = m - 750000
        tax += 0.15 * y
        m -= y
    if m > 500000:
        y = m - 500000
        tax += 0.1 * y
        m -= y
    if m > 250000:
        y = m - 250000
        tax += 0.05 * y
    result.append(x - tax)
for i in range(t):
    print(int(result[i]))

t = int(input())
while t:
    n = int(input())
    if n <= 250000:
        print(n)
    elif n <= 500000:
        tax = (n - 250000) * 0.05
        n = n - int(tax)
        print(n)
    elif n <= 750000:
        tax = (n - 500000) * 0.1 + 12500
        n = n - int(tax)
        print(n)
    elif n <= 1000000:
        tax = (n - 750000) * 0.15 + 37500
        n = n - int(tax)
        print(n)
    elif n <= 1250000:
        tax = (n - 1000000) * 0.2 + 75000
        n = n - int(tax)
        print(n)
    elif n <= 1500000:
        tax = (n - 1250000) * 0.25 + 125000
        n = n - int(tax)
        print(n)
    else:
        tax = (n - 1500000) * 0.3 + 187500
        n = n - int(tax)
        print(n)
    t -= 1

for t in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    a = n
    v5 = 0
    t = [12500, 25000, 37500, 50000, 62500]
    r = [5, 10, 15, 20, 25, 30]
    tax = 0
    if n > 1500000:
        v5 = n - 1500000
        n = 1500000
    v = n // 250000
    v2 = v - 1
    if v2 >= 0:
        for i in range(v2):
            tax = tax + t[i]
        v1 = n - v * 250000
        tax = tax + v1 * (r[v2] / 100)
        if v5 > 0:
            tax = tax + v5 * (30 / 100)
        print(int(a - tax))
    else:
        print(n)

t = int(input())
while t:
    sal = int(input())
    netsal = sal
    tax = 0
    if sal > 1500000:
        tax += (sal - 1500000) * 0.3
        sal = 1500000
    if sal > 1250000:
        tax += (sal - 1250000) * 0.25
        sal = 1250000
    if sal > 1000000:
        tax += (sal - 1000000) * 0.2
        sal = 1000000
    if sal > 750000:
        tax += (sal - 750000) * 0.15
        sal = 750000
    if sal > 500000:
        tax += (sal - 500000) * 0.1
        sal = 500000
    if sal > 250000:
        tax += (sal - 250000) * 0.05
        sal = 250000
    netsal = int(netsal - tax)
    print(netsal)
    t = t - 1

t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    n = int(input())
    a = n // 250000
    sum = 0
    f = 5
    if n <= 250000:
        print(n)
    elif 250000 < n <= 1500000:
        for j in range(a):
            x = 250000 * (j * f) / 100
            sum = sum + x
        d = n % 250000
        e = d * f * a / 100
        g = sum + e
        h = n - g
        p = int(h)
        print(p)
    elif n > 1500000:
        for k in range(6):
            x = 250000 * (k * f) / 100
            sum = sum + x
        l = n - 1500000
        m = l * 30 / 100
        sum2 = sum + m
        o = n - sum2
        q = int(o)
        print(q)

t = int(input())
for _ in range(t):
    n = int(input())
    slab = n // 250000
    if slab > 6:
        slab = 6
    s = 0
    for i in range(1, slab):
        s = s + 250000 / 100 * (i * 5)
    x = 250000 * slab
    yr = n - x
    s = s + yr / 100 * (slab * 5)
    print(int(n - s))

for _ in range(int(input())):
    taxincome = [250000, 500000, 750000, 1000000, 1250000, 1500000]
    taxrate = [5, 10, 15, 20, 25, 30]
    x = int(input())
    initialamount = x
    tax = 0
    taxedincome = 0
    for i in range(5, -1, -1):
        if x > taxincome[i]:
            taxedincome = x - taxincome[i]
            tax += taxedincome // 100 * taxrate[i]
            x -= taxedincome
    print(initialamount - tax)

reply = []
rates = [250000, 500000, 750000, 1000000, 1250000, 1500000]
r = [30, 25, 20, 15, 10, 5]
rates.reverse()
for _ in range(int(input())):
    income = int(input())
    dupe = income
    output = 0
    for i in range(len(rates)):
        if dupe > rates[i]:
            output += (dupe - rates[i]) * r[i] / 100
            dupe = rates[i]
        else:
            continue
    reply.append(int(income - output))
for i in reply:
    print(i)

(A, B, C, D, E, F) = (250000, 500000, 750000, 1000000, 1250000, 1500000)
t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    n = int(input())
    data = n
    final = 0
    if n <= A:
        final += data * 0
    elif n > A and n <= B:
        data = n - A
        final += data * 0.05
    elif n > B and n <= C:
        data = n - B
        final += data * 0.1 + A * 0.05
    elif n > C and n <= D:
        data = n - C
        final += data * 0.15 + A * 0.1 + A * 0.05
    elif n > D and n <= E:
        data = n - D
        final += data * 0.2 + A * 0.15 + A * 0.1 + A * 0.05
    elif n > E and n <= F:
        data = n - E
        final += data * 0.25 + A * 0.2 + A * 0.15 + A * 0.1 + A * 0.05
    else:
        data = n - F
        final += data * 0.3 + A * 0.25 + A * 0.2 + A * 0.15 + A * 0.1 + A * 0.05
    print(int(n - final))
